017package org.apache.juneau.bean.atom;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.StringUtils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.XmlFormat.*;
021
022import java.net.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.*;
026
027/**
028 * Represents an <c>atomContent</c> construct in the RFC4287 specification.
029 *
030 * <h5 class='figure'>Schema</h5>
031 * <p class='bschema'>
032 *    atomContent = atomInlineTextContent
033 *       | atomInlineXHTMLContent
034 *       | atomInlineOtherContent
035 *       | atomOutOfLineContent
036 *
037 *    atomInlineTextContent =
038 *       element atom:content {
039 *          atomCommonAttributes,
040 *          attribute type { "text" | "html" }?,
041 *          (text)*
042 *       }
043 *
044 *    atomInlineXHTMLContent =
045 *       element atom:content {
046 *          atomCommonAttributes,
047 *          attribute type { "xhtml" },
048 *          xhtmlDiv
049 *       }
050 *
051 *    atomInlineOtherContent =
052 *       element atom:content {
053 *          atomCommonAttributes,
054 *          attribute type { atomMediaType }?,
055 *          (text|anyElement)*
056 *    }
057 *
058 *    atomOutOfLineContent =
059 *       element atom:content {
060 *          atomCommonAttributes,
061 *          attribute type { atomMediaType }?,
062 *          attribute src { atomUri },
063 *          empty
064 *    }
065 * </p>
066 *
067 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
068 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanAtom">juneau-bean-atom</a>
069 * </ul>
070 */
071@FluentSetters
072public class Content extends Text {
073
074   private URI src;
075
076
077   /**
078    * Normal content.
079    *
080    * @param type The content type of this content.
081    */
082   public Content(String type) {
083      super(type);
084   }
085
086   /**
087    * Normal content.
088    */
089   public Content() {
090   }
091
092
093   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
094   // Bean properties
095   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
096
097   /**
098    * Bean property getter:  <property>src</property>.
099    *
100    * <p>
101    * The source URI.
102    *
103    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
104    */
105   @Xml(format=ATTR)
106   public URI getSrc() {
107      return src;
108   }
109
110   /**
111    * Bean property setter:  <property>src</property>.
112    *
113    * <p>
114    * The source URI.
115    *
116    * <p>
117    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
118    * Strings must be valid URIs.
119    *
120    * @param value
121    *    The new value for this property.
122    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
123    * @return This object
124    */
125   public Content setSrc(Object value) {
126      this.src = toURI(value);
127      return this;
128   }
129
130
131   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
132   // Overridden setters (to simplify method chaining)
133   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
134
135   @Override /* Text */
136   public Content setText(String text) {
137      super.setText(text);
138      return this;
139   }
140
141   @Override /* Text */
142   public Content setType(String type) {
143      super.setType(type);
144      return this;
145   }
146
147   // <FluentSetters>
148
149   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.bean.atom.Common */
150   public Content setBase(Object value) {
151      super.setBase(value);
152      return this;
153   }
154
155   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.bean.atom.Common */
156   public Content setLang(String value) {
157      super.setLang(value);
158      return this;
159   }
160
161   // </FluentSetters>
162}
